entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 7:05 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
